hero.title: From First Contact to Bound Risk — in One Intelligent Conversation
hero.subtitle: This interactive journey demonstrates how agentic AI transforms global insurance broking — connecting client engagement, broking intelligence, and execution workflows into one orchestrated experience.

personas.name: Atlas
bullets: Complex risk: Marine, Property, Cyber, Liability

personas.name: Mark Thurman
bullets: Senior specialty broker responsible for structuring multinational programs

steps.title: AI surfaces Atlas as strategic account opportunity
steps.summary: High-potential leads are scored and prioritised on the Relationship Manager homepage.
whatHappens: AI analyzes global footprint & risk profile
Scores opportunities based on renewal cycles
Prioritises Atlas on the Salesforce RM homepage
RM initiates contact with client stakeholders
soWhat: Broker focus directed to high-value opportunities
Eliminates manual lead research & vetting
Data-driven prioritization of global pipeline
Instant awareness of strategic account potential

steps.title: Customer interest confirmed
steps.summary: Atlas confirms interest via email and provides supporting documentation.
whatHappens: Customer responds via email with intent
Supporting risk documents are shared
Salesforce CRM tracks interaction history
System prepares for autonomous processing
soWhat: Seamless transition from lead to engagement
High-fidelity capture of client data
Standardized intake of risk documentation
Audit trail of initial client contact

steps.title: Autonomous record orchestration
steps.summary: AI analyses emails + attachments to create account and opportunity records automatically.
whatHappens: Agent 1 analyses email and risk attachments
Automatically creates Account and Opportunity
Generates 360° view of Atlas global hierarchy
Initiates automated onboarding screening
soWhat: Drastic reduction in manual CRM data entry
Unified view of complex global entity structure
Compliance checks started early in cycle
Higher data accuracy from automated ingestion

steps.title: Intelligent cross-border hierarchy
steps.summary: Surfaces related accounts and products across hierarchies to identify cross-sell opportunities.
whatHappens: Maps parents & subsidiaries across EMEA, APAC, NA
Surfaces similar operating models via industry tags
Displays active products across related accounts
Identifies natural cross-sell gaps for Atlas
soWhat: Maximum awareness of global placement gaps
Intelligence-led account expansion strategy
Lower administrative burden of mapping groups
Enhanced advisory value to the global risk manager

steps.title: AI-powered briefing briefing
steps.summary: Generates a comprehensive summary including risk insights and commercial positioning.
whatHappens: RM schedules meeting via Quick Action
AI generates account and risk insights summary
Highlights cross-sell & renewal opportunities
Provides commercial positioning guidance
soWhat: Broker prep time reduced from hours to seconds
Highly personalized meeting agenda
Strategy-led negotiation vs process-led
Consistent advisory quality across the firm

steps.title: Client meeting & mobile orchestration
steps.summary: RM holds client meeting and updates CRM in real-time using voice.
whatHappens: RM holds strategic meeting with Atlas stakeholders
Customer agrees to expand product coverage
RM updates Opportunity via mobile voice component
Real-time CRM accuracy and task assignment
soWhat: Instant conversion of meeting notes to data
Eliminates end-of-day admin backlog
High-fidelity capture of client intent
Direct path from advice to market execution

steps.title: Automated RFQ & Quote Ingestion
steps.summary: Issues RFQs to panel and ingests carrier responses automatically.
whatHappens: RM issues RFQ to global insurer panel
Emails from carriers are ingested by Agent 2
Quote data is standardized into FSC records
Identifies exposure, premium, and wording details
soWhat: Unified view of all carrier responses
Removes friction from document comparison
Automated audit trail of market engagement
Speed to market enhanced by AI standardization

steps.title: Intelligent Quote Analysis Agent
steps.summary: AI compares quotes across multiple variables and ranks recommendations.
whatHappens: Compares premiums, limits, and exclusions
Reviews complex wording and conditions
Produces ranked recommendation with rationale
Highlights deviations from Atlas requirements
soWhat: Deep technical insight without manual analysis
Defensible selection logic for global client
Risk-weighted comparison beyond just price
Consistent assessment across diverse programs

steps.title: Conversational priority adjustment
steps.summary: RM adjusts ranking priorities conversationally to match client-specific intent.
whatHappens: RM requests 'favor coverage over commission'
AI performs dynamic re-ranking of options
Justifies recommendation based on client feedback
RM ready to present final data-backed advice
soWhat: Real-time agility during client discussions
Transparent decision-making process
Personalized outcome for the global риск manager
Empowers broker as high-value strategic advisor
